RxML.TEXT: <gender>Female</gender> <age>19-24</age> <treatment_length>1 to less than 2 years</treatment_length> <satisfaction>5</satisfaction> <effectiveness>5</effectiveness> <condition>Condition: Birth Control</condition> <comment>I have been on Junel for a year now and I have nothing but good to say about it! This is the first birth control I have tried and I LOVE it!</comment>
